column5: Your private studio/suite is ready and waiting to be a tranquil haven away from an action-packed experience in Austin. Your suite includes a bedroom, bathroom, and Sitting/TV/Garden room with private patio entrance and parking . The newly remodeled suite boasts upscale furnishings and is decorated with a unique collection of original Texas and Latin American art. Your host will be delighted to help you make wonderful memories of her weird and wonderful city and all that it has to offer.
column8: Sophisticated & Hip Studio Hideaway in SW Austin!
